description: Try our easy to follow Sugar Snap Pea & Chorizo Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sugar Snap Pea & Chorizo Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top and tail peas and remove strings from sides, splitting some in half lengthways to expose peas. Place chorizo in a cold frying pan and cook over medium heat for 6-8 minutes or until golden and fat has been released. Use a slotted spoon to transfer to a paper towel-lined plate. Add capsicum to pan and cook for 5 minutes or until softened.
Increase heat to medium-high, add peas and thyme and cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until bright green.
Remove pan from heat and stir in chorizo, oil, vinegar and almonds. Season to taste.
Serve as an accompaniment to grilled salmon or chargrilled chicken.
